thread.section_title: Italki 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Italki 的点评意见 | www.italki.com
thread.title: Madhuvanti Srinivasan
thread.title_full: Italki 的点评人 Madhuvanti Srinivasan

author: Madhuvanti Srinivasan
title: Madhuvanti Srinivasan
text: It has been a year since I started using Italki and the purpose for which I came here has been fulfilling. I can see the difference. I wanted to learn Turkish a lot more seriously and needed help. The community and tutors on Italki are fantastic. Fantastic to an extent that they make your language goals so much more realistic and doable! I strongly recommend this place for all those who are not just language enthusiasts but also people with a great urge to connect with like minded language lovers and learn more & more :)
